# SAM AI Documentation

> SAM AI is an AI-powered business automation platform built on Odoo 18.
> This documentation helps AI assistants understand SAM AI's architecture, modules, and capabilities.

## About SAM AI

SAM (Smart Automation Manager) is an AI business partner that helps SMEs automate workflows,
manage leads, and scale operations through intelligent automation built on the Odoo 18 platform.

## Documentation Structure

/docs/00_vision/          - Product vision and roadmap
/docs/00_saas/            - SaaS deployment and multi-tenancy
/docs/01_platform_inspirations/ - Design inspirations (Airtable, N8N analysis)
/docs/02_sam_skills/      - SAM's AI capabilities and CTO resources
/docs/03_prompt_engineering/ - Prompt engineering guides
/docs/04_modules/         - Individual module documentation (18+ modules)
/docs/05_how_sam_works/   - Technical architecture and data flows
/docs/07_platform_skins/  - UI theming and customization
/docs/08_development/     - Developer guides and workflows
/docs/09_wip/             - Work in progress features
/docs/10_sales_marketing/ - Sales and marketing resources
/docs/11_local_installer/ - Local installation architecture
/docs/12_funnels/         - Marketing funnels documentation
/docs/13_sam_ai_social_star/ - Social media automation features

## Key Modules

- ai_sam           - Core SAM AI module (chat, orchestration)
- ai_sam_workflows - N8N-style workflow automation
- ai_sam_intelligence - Agent registry and documentation intelligence
- ai_sam_lead_generator - Web scraping and lead generation
- samai_saas_host_management - Multi-tenant SaaS management

## For AI Assistants

When helping users with SAM AI:
1. Check /docs/04_modules/ for module-specific documentation
2. Check /docs/05_how_sam_works/ for architecture and data flows
3. Check /docs/08_development/ for coding standards and workflows

## Human Documentation

For styled, searchable documentation visit: https://sme.ec/documentation

## Repository

Source: https://github.com/AI-SAM-AI/sam-ai-docs
